00143 typedef void *(*T_def_Fn)(void *, int , size_t );
00144 
00149 typedef struct {
00150                 T_def_Fn f; 
00151                 char *name; 
00152 } T_def_test;
00153 
00155 T_def_test def_tests[] = {
00156         {memset, "local"},
00157         /*{i386_memset, "i386"},  /* Gentoo local */
00158         /*{i586_memset, "i586"},  /* slowest overall */
00159         /*{i686_memset, "i686"},  /* alignment preamble broken */
00160         /*{i686_memset_fix, "i686fix"}, /*  much slower for random alignments */
00161         {lx_memset_zan, "lx_zan" },   /* overall just worse than _hyb */
00162         /*{lx_memset_simp, "lx_simp" }, /*fastest aligned, slowest unaligned */
00163         {lx_memset_hyb, "lx_hyb" },   /* overall winner -R and -A */
00164         /*{lx_memset_hyb_BA, "lx_hyb_BA" }, /* BIGGER ALIGN SIZE DOESN'T HELP */
00165         /*{lx_memset_mmx, "lx_mmx" }, /* 32 by unroll is never faster than _hyb */
00166         /*{lx_memset_mmx64, "lx_mmx64" }, /* faster than hyb for > 512 (256?) */
00167         /*{lx_memset_mmx64simp, "lx_mmx64simp" }, /* No alignment or skip logic */
00168         {lx_memset_mmx64_BA, "lx_mmx64_BA" }, /*BIGGER ALIGN SIZE */
00169         {lx_memset_mmx64_h2, "lx_mmx64_h2" } /*Big align and skip mmx if < 512 */
00170 };
00171 
00173 #define NUM_TEST (sizeof(def_tests)/sizeof(T_def_test))
